div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1850px; height: 616px;

div.div: Due to the on-going Covid 19 virus, all schools within the Robla School District are closed as of Monday March 16th and students will not return to our schools for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. For more detailed information on the school closures or how to receive meals for your children during this time, please visit our Covid-19 response page.

Our Meals on Wheels program is available weekdays to children under age 18 in our community while school is out from 3/16/20 through 06/12/2020 due to school closures. Please participate and encourage your children to enjoy a healthy Breakfast and Lunch from us. Find the closest Meal Distribution Stop to your home.

div.a: Greetings from Ruben Reyes, Superintendent for the Robla School District

div.div: Are you looking for a place where your child can learn and grow at their own pace? A place filled with adventure where art and activities fuel creativity? Do you seek an environment where your little one is safe to explore and discover? Do you want preschool staff members who can speak in your native language?
Currently we are accepting registrations for our afternoon program from 12-3 p.m.
Safe and reliable transportation to and from school (currently available for afternoon program only)

div.strong: Robla Preschool-Ready for Kinder, Ready for Life

div.div: For more information and to register, visit: https://preschool.robla.k12.ca.us/enrollment/
Location: Robla Community Park, 625 Bell Avenue
Location: Robla Community Park, 625 Bell Avenue
